xwikidoc.name: SecurityAdvisoryApplicationTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status=状態 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_draft=下書き SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_completed=完了 ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_announced=Announced SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_disclosed=公開済 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_title1=タイトル SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_title_hint=アドバイザリーのタイトル SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_product=製品 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_product_hint=影響される製品（xwiki-platform、xwiki-rendering、application-change-requestなど） SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_mavenModules=Mavenのモジュール ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_mavenModules_hint=Impacted maven modules using full package definition without version (e.g. org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-oldcore) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_affectedVersions=影響されるバージョン SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_affectedVersions_hint=脆弱性により影響される全てのバージョン（<、<=、>、>= などの演算子を利用できます） SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_patchedVersions=修正済のバージョン ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_patchedVersions_hint=All versions that have been patched (only single versions are accepted here, operators are not allowed) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_advisoryLink=アドバイザリーのリンク SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_advisoryLink_hint=GitHubのアドバイザリーのリンク SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_jiraTickets=JIRAのチケット SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_jiraTickets_hint=JIRAのチケットの一覧（リンクではなく、チケットキーを表示） ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_computeEmbargo=compute embargo ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_computeEmbargo_hint=Define if the embargo date should be computed automatically from versions or not. ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_embargoDate=Embargo date ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_embargoDate_hint=Define a specific embargo date: this one is only taken into account if the compute embargo date flag is not checked. SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_cvss=CVSSのスコア SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_cvss_hint=文字列の形式での計算済のCVSSの値。 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_description=説明 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_description_hint=アドバイザリーの全文。
# Sheet keys securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.description=このページでは、セキュリティーアドバイザリーアプリケーションのページが閲覧と編集モードで表示される様式を調整できます。 securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.noObject=現在のページには、セキュリティーアドバイザリーアプリケーションのオブジェクトがありません。 securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.noFields=セキュリティーアドバイザリーアプリケーションに、表示するフィールドがありません。
# Live table generic keys securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.title=ページのタイトル securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.name=ページ名 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.space=スペース securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.fullname=ページの完全な名称 ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.location=Location securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.author=最終更新者 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.creator=作者 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.date=日付 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.creationDate=作成日 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._avatar=アバター securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._images=画像 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._attachments=添付ファイル securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions=アクション securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions.edit=編集 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions.delete=削除 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.status=状態 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.title1=タイトル securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.product=製品 securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.mavenModules=Mavenのモジュール securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.affectedVersions=影響されるバージョン securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.patchedVersions=修正済のバージョン securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.advisoryLink=アドバイザリーのリンク securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.jiraTickets=JIRAのチケット ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.computeEmbargo=compute embargo ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.embargoDate=Embargo date ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.cvss=CVSS Score ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.description=Description
# Other keys ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.entry.name=Security Advisory Application ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.home.right.warning=The {0}security entry space{1} is currently open to any users: you should restrict its access.
# Configuration ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_embargoDurationUnit=Unit of the duration to use for the embargo computation ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_embargoDurationUnit.hint=The unit is based on ChronoUnit values (e.g. minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, etc) ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_defaultEmbargoDuration=Duration value to use for the embargo computation ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_defaultEmbargoDuration.hint=This value computed with its unit will be added to the date of the latest patched release date for the advisory publication ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_securityGroup=The group of targeted users for advisories notifications SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_securityGroup.hint=このグループのユーザーは、アドバイザリーの公開準備が完了した際に自動的に通知を受信します。
# Sheet Explanations securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DRAFT=アドバイザリーの下書きを編集しています。完了後、ページの上部にあるボタンから完了済に設定できます。 ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.COMPLETED=Now the advisory is complete, you should announce it to the dedicated channels defined in the security policy. Once the advisory is announced you can switch its status with the button on top of the page. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.ANNOUNCED=This advisory has been announced. It will be automatically marked as disclosable when the embargo date will be reached. It's possible that the embargo date is not yet computed if the patched versions are not released yet. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DISCLOSABLE=This advisory can now be disclosed according to its embargo date. You should request a CVE and publish it. Once done you need to mark it disclosed with the button on top of the page. securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DISCLOSED=アドバイザリーを公開しました。
# Deprecated keys securityadvisoryapplication.dataSpace.title=データ
